# Justify Items

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                         | Support     |
| ----------------------------- | ----------- |
| `justify-items-start`         | 🌐 Web only |
| `justify-items-end`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `justify-items-center`        | 🌐 Web only |
| `justify-items-stretch`       | 🌐 Web only |
